Class ArchiveChapter

java.lang.Object
com.laoluade.ingestor.ao3.core.ArchiveChapter
public class ArchiveChapter extends Object

This class is a data model for an AO3 chapter. ArchiveIngestor uses this to store relevant chapter information over time.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    String
    chapterTitle
    This attribute stores the title of the chapter.
    String
    creationHash
    This attribute stores the unique SHA-256 generated by the chapter's information.
    ZonedDateTime
    creationTimestamp
    This attribute stores the time and date when the chapter object is created.
    ArrayList<String>
    endNotes
    This attribute stores the ending notes of the chapter.
    ArrayList<ArchiveComment>
    foundComments
    This attribute stores the comment threads of the chapter.
    String
    pageLink
    This attribute stores the web link of the page where the chapter was parsed.
    String
    pageTitle
    This attribute stores the title of the page where the chapter was parsed.
    ArrayList<String>
    paragraphs
    This attribute stores the paragraph text of the chapter.
    ArchiveStoryInfo
    parentArchiveStoryInfo
    This attribute stores the parent ArchiveStoryInfo object representing story metadata.
    ArrayList<String>
    startNotes
    This attribute stores the starting notes of the chapter.
    ArrayList<String>
    summary
    This attribute stores the summary of the chapter.

  • Constructor Details

    • ArchiveChapter

      public ArchiveChapter(ArchiveStoryInfo parentArchiveStoryInfo, String pageTitle, String chapterTitle, ArrayList<String> summary, ArrayList<String> startNotes, ArrayList<String> endNotes, ArrayList<String> paragraphs)

      This constructor initializes the chapter object using information retrieved early in the archive parsing process. The creation timestamp and hash is based off of this information.

      Parameters:
      parentArchiveStoryInfo - The ArchiveStoryInfo holding the story metadata.
      pageTitle - The parsed title of the page from the browser.
      chapterTitle - The parsed (or autogenerated) chapter title.
      summary - The parsed chapter summary (or an empty ArrayList).
      startNotes - The parsed chapter starting notes (or an empty ArrayList).
      endNotes - The parsed chapter ending notes (or an empty ArrayList).
      paragraphs - The parsed chapter text (it BETTER not be an empty ArrayList).

  • Method Details

    • setPageLink

      public void setPageLink(String pageLink)

      This method sets the pageLink attribute of the object.

      Parameters:
      pageLink - The link where the chapter was parsed from (gotten through Selenium).

    • setFoundComments

      public void setFoundComments(ArrayList<ArchiveComment> foundComments)

      This method sets the foundComments attribute of the object.

      Parameters:
      foundComments - The JSONObject of comment threads.

    • getJSONRepWithParent

      public org.json.JSONObject getJSONRepWithParent()

      This method retrieves a JSONObject representation of the chapter with the parentArchiveStoryInfo attribute included.

      Returns:
      JSONObject representation of the chapter with the story metadata.

    • getJSONRepWithoutParent

      public org.json.JSONObject getJSONRepWithoutParent()

      This method retrieves a JSONObject representation of the chapter without the parentArchiveStoryInfo attribute.

      Returns:
      JSONObject representation of the chapter without the story metadata.
